description: Second-to-last day in Tokyo - favorite districts and final experiences

activities.description: Breakfast in a favorite Tokyo neighborhood
Tokyo National Museum or teamLab Borderless
Final shopping in Harajuku or Shibuya
Visit Tokyo Skytree or Tokyo Tower at sunset
Special dinner at a high-end restaurant

reservations.name: Home in Shinjuku City
reservations.description: Private room in Shinjuku hosted by Okamoto - 7 minutes walk to Shinjuku Gyoen, near station, clean private room perfect for sightseeing, continuing stay from December 8th

meals: Breakfast: Local cafe, Lunch: Tsukiji/Ginza, Dinner: Special restaurant
notes: Make the most of the second-to-last day. Visit any missed attractions and enjoy final Tokyo experiences.
